CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c)), Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Career_Presentation_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SI_3_Scheduled__c)), SI_3_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), SI_3_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c)), SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), SI_2_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c)), SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), SI_1_Date_Scheduled__c, IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c)), Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c >= TODAY()), Attraction_Interview_Date_Scheduled__c, NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Next Meeting Date
